description: Creates a universally unique identifier (UUID) mapped to a list of local user ids within an application.

parameters.name: applicationId
parameters.description: The identifier of the application for which the user mapping will be created.

parameters.name: userId
parameters.description: The user emails attached to a user mapping.

parameters.name: userAliases
parameters.description: The list of user aliases in the mapping. (dict) --- Aliases attached to a user id within an Amazon Q Business application. indexId (string) --- The identifier of the index that the user aliases are associated with. dataSourceId (string) --- The identifier of the data source that the user aliases are associated with. The identifier of the user id associated with the user aliases.

nested_params.name: indexId
nested_params.description: The identifier of the index that the user aliases are associated with.

nested_params.name: dataSourceId
nested_params.description: The identifier of the data source that the user aliases are associated with.

nested_params.name: userId
nested_params.description: The identifier of the user id associated with the user aliases.

parameters.name: clientToken
parameters.description: A token that you provide to identify the request to create your Amazon Q Business user mapping. This field is autopopulated if not provided.
